Message:
Aura was laid to rest
in the casket of glass
I’d had made for her.

Her corpse remains
the same as the day she died.

All because...
I wished not to be left alone
in this world...

I saw my face
reflected in the glass.

Why do I look like
I’m about to cry...?

Why...am I the only one
left alive...?!

My punishment for
not being able to protect Aura,
and for denying her
a peaceful rest...

I’ll accept the hand
fate’s dealt me...
This time, I’ll fend off
all who try to take Aura.
Until the day I breathe my last...

I warded off all who came
to disturb Aura thereafter.

Until the day I pointed my blade
at yet another approaching figure
in need of a lesson...

“I-I came to leave
some flowers for her!”

Anyone who’s ever
shown their face here
has tried to steal Aura away.
But, this girl is different...

Seeing the bundle of wildflowers
in the girl’s hands,
I felt tears stream down
my cheeks.
